h2_title: Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: Finally, if you try to get too far away from him to rest and heal up, there’s a chance his single blade slash will instead create tornadoes of blood to seek you out! This only seems to happen when you stay at range from him, and he can follow these up with his other blood slashes to keep you from getting close.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, if you try to get too far away from him to rest and heal up, there’s a chance his single blade slash will instead create tornadoes of blood to seek you out! This only seems to happen when you stay at range from him, and he can follow these up with his other blood slashes to keep you from getting close.
